nodes.text: Cygnats were small biting pests that could be found on the planet of Thisspias. The native Thisspiasians such as Oppo Rancisis grew dense beards to deter their bites. Some Thisspiasians who were opposed to Thisspias' Blood Monarchy wore cygnat pins—which were also associated with terrorists who assassinated the Blood Monarch some two hundred years before the Galactic Empire.
